The Impact of Policy X on Public Outcomes

Iker Uriarte, Co-Author Name

Journal of Public Policy

2024

Abstract

This study examines the effects of Policy X on various public outcomes using a mixed-methods approach. We find significant improvements in areas A, B, and C.
